definitions.definition: A simplified representation of a smiling face .
A sequence of text characters used to represent a mood, especially :) or :-) or other depictions of smiling.
examples: How do you type the angry smiley ?

definitions.definition: An improvised street weapon consisting of a length of chain with padlocks and other heavy objects affixed to one end.
The type of piercing of the upper frenulum (upper lip ).

main_definition: A simplified representation of a smiling face .
secondary_definitions: ( Internet ) A sequence of text characters used to represent a mood, especially :) or :-) or other depictions of smiling.
( rare ) An improvised street weapon consisting of a length of chain with padlocks and other heavy objects affixed to one end.
( South Africa ) A roasted sheep 's head .
The type of piercing of the upper frenulum (upper lip ).
